events.text: Hello There, My name is Metal Wolf MK CCCLX. I am the prototype of Metal Garurumon X.  I'm here to explain the mechanics of this 'Lupine Legacy : The Pack of West' game. [b]For the next dialogue or interaction [/b], press [wave amp=45 freq=3][b] Z[/b][/wave]

events.portrait: Metal Wolf Anthro MK CCCLX standby Glanting
events.text: Press [wave amp=45 freq=3][b]W[/b][/wave]  to go forward

0.file: res://Assets/sounds/Dialogues/Metal Wolf Anthro MK CCCLX/Metal Wolf Anthro MK CCCLX D02.mp3

events.portrait: Metal Wolf Anthro MK CCCLX standby glanting 2
events.text: Press [wave amp=45 freq=3][b]S[/b][/wave] to go backward

0.file: res://Assets/sounds/Dialogues/Metal Wolf Anthro MK CCCLX/Metal Wolf Anthro MK CCCLX D03.mp3

events.text: Press [wave amp=45 freq=3][b]A[/b][/wave] to move left

0.file: res://Assets/sounds/Dialogues/Metal Wolf Anthro MK CCCLX/Metal Wolf Anthro MK CCCLX D04.mp3

events.text: Press [wave amp=45 freq=3][b]D[/b][/wave] to move right

0.file: res://Assets/sounds/Dialogues/Metal Wolf Anthro MK CCCLX/Metal Wolf Anthro MK CCCLX D05.mp3

events.text: Press [wave amp=45 freq=3][b]I[/b][/wave] to open inventory

0.file: res://Assets/sounds/Dialogues/Metal Wolf Anthro MK CCCLX/Metal Wolf Anthro MK CCCLX D06.mp3

events.portrait: Metal Wolf Anthro MK CCCLX missle
events.text: Press [wave amp=45 freq=3][b]P[/b][/wave] to pause the game

0.file: res://Assets/sounds/Dialogues/Metal Wolf Anthro MK CCCLX/Metal Wolf Anthro MK CCCLX D07.mp3

events.portrait: Metal Wolf Anthro MK CCCLX Over
events.text: That's all from me. Good luck

0.file: res://Assets/sounds/Dialogues/Metal Wolf Anthro MK CCCLX/Metal Wolf Anthro MK CCCLX D08.mp3
